document.full_text: bahrain floated the idea of expanding military bases within a bloc of sunni-led gulf arab allies that helped it quash shi'ite protests in march, while u.s. president barack obama criticized manama over its crackdown.
document.title: bahrain wants to expand military bases
lines_and_colors: bahrain floated the idea of expanding military bases within a bloc of sunni-led gulf arab allies that helped it quash shi'ite protests in march, while u.s. president barack obama criticized manama over its crackdown.
